The TikTok video posted by: scouseblu on Dec. 17, 2020, which purported to highlight the fate of Kevin's airline ticket in "Home Alone."

Observations from fans on TikTok and Twi: 4. The scene in "Home Alone" where Kevin's family hands their stack of tickets to a gate agent, who does not appear to look at the tickets but conducts a headcount instead.
